text:
I am a embedded system engenier 
I try to porting apache2+php to our embedded system (arm9 linux kernel 2.6.15.7)
I cross compiling all in x86-linux system and tftp to embedded system running
cross compiling enviroment gcc-3.4.2-glibc-2.3.3
I cross compiling expat-1.95.8 apr-1.2.7 apr-util-1.2.7 pcre-5.0
and cross compiling apache2.2.0 2.2.3 2.2.4 with apr-1.2.7 apr-util-1.2.7(needed
expat) pcre-5.0
and cross compiling PHP4.4.4 with a normal compilng apache2
If I don't add php module apache2 running well
but when I add php moduel always get child pid xxx exit signal Segmentation
fault (11) when I open any url(exist or none exist url same result)
[Thu Jan 01 00:31:50 1970] [notice] Apache/2.2.0 (Unix) PHP/4.4.4 configured --
resuming normal operations
[Thu Jan 01 00:31:54 1970] [notice] child pid 242 exit signal Segmentation fault
(11)
[Thu Jan 01 00:31:58 1970] [notice] child pid 244 exit signal Segmentation fault
(11)


and then I try to cross compiling other apache2 version 2.0.59 with apr-0.9.13
apr-util-0.9.13(needed expat)
and cross compiling PHP4.4.4 with a normal compilng apache2
I can running apache2+php well


I don't know where is the problem. I use same setting to apache2.2.3+php4.4.4(or
php5.2.0)
alwys get child pid xxx exit signal Segmentation fault (11) when I open any url
is php cross compiling intergrade to apache2.2.X problem or apache2.2.X have
some problem?
creator: always0806@gmail.com
wrowe@apache.org
text:
If you are a systems engineer, surely you understand the value of a backtrace
to help diagnose this issue?

creator: always0806@gmail.com
text:
I am a newbie to linux enviroment
I try to learn how to use gdb
but my embedded system only left 1MB space
I try to cross compiling gdb to embedded linux but failed
and even I cross compiling success 
I don't have more space to put file to my embedded system

I learn how to gdb remote debug
this is infomation

arm board
/gdbserver # ./gdbserver 192.168.1.103:555 /www/apache/bin/httpd
Process /www/apache/bin/httpd created; pid = 396
Listening on port 555
Remote debugging from host 192.168.1.57

linux pc
This GDB was configured as "--host=i686-pc-linux-gnu --target=arm-linux".
(gdb) target remote 192.168.1.103:555
Remote debugging using 192.168.1.103:555
0x40000dd0 in ?? ()


but i don't how to continue???
creator: always0806@gmail.com
nick@webthing.com
text: If we were to support PHP (unlikely) or cross-compiling (ideally yes, but there's no guarantee anyone has the expertise), it should be on the dev list, not here.
